firmware.name: HoneySens BeagleBone Black Firmware
firmware.description: Debian-based firmware that runs dockerized services

entry.desc: Networking fixes
Enforcement of HTTP/1.1 communication
EAPOL support
Support for event caching, an adjustable service network range, new LED notification modes and USB auditing
Fixed a bug that prevented service downloads through proxies
Support for remote server certificate updates
Support for remote certificate updates
Static DNS servers are now properly recognized, local USB dnsmasq disabled to close port 53
NTLM proxy support via cntlm and disk usage reporting added. Requires server 1.0.0.
Rebuilt image based on Debian 9 for compatibility with HoneySens Server 1.0.x
Updated firmware metadata for compatibility with HoneySens Server 1.0
Support for event indication LEDs added
SSH honeypot made more responsive to connection attempts
Kippo replaced with cowrie
Proxy auth scheme autodiscovery added
Enhanced proxy authentication scheme support
HTTP(s) basic proxy authentication
Fixes for time synchronization and recon mode
Gateway and DNS support, Bug fixes
HTTP(S) Proxy support, Manual login disabled
SSH server fixed, polling process handles network configuration changes more efficient
Initial release
